lines.text: Okay, here's what it is:
One of your guys outside was working with Opal-
That's- no one's working with- you lying-
Technically, they're all your coworkers, so...
-and they brought, like, some sort of drilling tool with them, to drill a hole in the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard.</c>
...Where are you even g-going with this?
Or maybe they didn't bring it- maybe Opal had it and the accomplice brought it out.
Point is, Mystery Accomplice X explains why there's no hidden hole-drilling tool.
Hold it, hold it- I'm with Whydah. Why the hole-drillin' tool?
Well, the victim was intending to fake his death, but Opal or Accomplice X actually killed him.
So we can explain the other two things as fakes, but the hole is real, and it killed him.
Th-this is nonsense! What are y-y-you- why would I- you're accusing me of...?!
I mean, you'd do anything to discredit Leo, right?
So you made sure there wouldn't be anyone for us to question.
That's- no! Not- not murder! That's- this is insanity!
Hey, hey, don't panic! It's all lies, right? I'm sure we can clear this up.
Leo, you want to have your guys downstairs do a check for a murder weapon?
...Seeker, this is goin' a little far. Your idea is... kind of...
It can't hurt to check, right?
...*sigh*
Leo opens the radio channel, recaps the accusations, and gives some orders.
He has to repeat himself a few times.
...No, yeah, that's what I said.
Uh-huh. No, just check for- yeah, that.
No, I'm fine. What're you-
Whaddaya mean how many fingers are you holdin' up?!
It's a radio, you knucklehead!
*snrk*
...Wait. You...
None- none of that was serious, was it? Y-you just wanted Leo to sound ridiculous to his men.
I don't know what you're talking about.
...Well, I appreciate it.
